title: Post WWI Germany seeks aid cartoon

content.question: Directions: In your responses, be sure to address all parts of the questions you answer. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Describe one cause of the international situation depicted in the cartoon. Explain one effect of the international situation depicted in the cartoon. Explain the cartoonist’s perspective on the international situation depicted in the cartoon.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
